name: Don't Mess With Totems LD34
description:
Two button vertical platformer game. Adventure of a small brave hedgehog who's fearless hunting for his Nut on dangerous growing totem!

Controls:

X - jump, hold X to double jump, Z - dash to the opposite side


Game by Noclip: Aleksey Stepanov - code, Ekaterina Frolova - art

Special thanks for the "SimpleStamp" font by Oleg Stepanov


Made With Unity

Free music by Blue Dot Sessions
